page.title: 10Newsham Grange (2)
page.content: The River Wiske goes through the farm's land,it is polluted.The farmer has never seen a fish in the river and his cows won't drink the river water. He thought the river had been polluted by the Chicken Factory up river. A disused railway line runs through one of the fields.British Railways stopped using it in 1955.It used to run between Harrogate,Ripon and Northallerton.The fields were divided mainly by hawthorn hedges. We saw two thrushes'nests in one hedge and on our way to see the sheep,a yellow hammer,sitting on a fence post whistled at us.
